page.title: 15Winsters Buildings
page.content: There are many interesting buildings in the village. These are mainly 16th 17th or 18th century in origin. {Market House C16}In the main street, two stories high.This was the first building ever taken over by the National Trust and restored in 1906. {Church }Tower early C18 but the rest of the building rebuilt in mid C19. {Work House}Built in the mid C18 on the edge of the village.It has been derelict for many years but is now being rebuilt as a private reside {Other buildings of interest:}Bank House C16,a wheelwright shop C18, Oddo House C18,The Dower House C16 The Hall C17,The Old Angel Inn which is haunted,The Village School built in 1866 by public subscription and two old public houses-The Bowling Green and the Miners' Standard C17.
